devdoc.details: The contract heavily depends on 3rd party modules from QuickSwap, Chainlink to running. Check out docs.tamago.finance for more details

addAddress(address).details: adds a given address to the whitelist

returns.baseTokenAmount: required amount of token0 on LP
returns.lpAmount: Estimated LP amount to be deposited as a collateral
returns.pairTokenAmount: required amount of token1 on LP

returns.baseTokenAmount: redeemed amount of token0 on LP
returns.lpAmount: Estimated LP amount to be withdrawn from Quickswap
returns.pairTokenAmount: redeemed amount of token1 on LP

returns._0: US price per a LP token
US price per a synthetic token

params._collateralShareAddress: the address of LP token to be used as a collateral
params._collateralShareSymbol: the symbol of LP token that defined on the price registry
params._nftUri: base uri for the ERC-1155 NFT
params._priceResolverAddress: the address of the shared price feeder registry
params._syntheticSymbol: the symbol of value-backed NFT that defined on the price registry

isWhitelisted(address).details: returns true if a given address is whitelisted, false if not

returns._0: true if the address is whitelisted, false if not

params._maxBaseAmount: cap amount of token0 that can be sent out from the wallet
params._maxPairAmount: cap amount of token1 that can be sent out from the wallet

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._minBaseAmount: min. amount of token0 expects to receive
params._minPairAmount: min. amount of token1 expects to receive

removeAddress(address).details: removes a given address from the whitelist

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: A contract to collaterizes ERC-20 and mints NFT

estimateMint(uint8,uint256).notice: calculate amount of collateral assets to be placed for minting the NFT

estimateRedeem(uint8,uint256).notice: calcualte amount of collateral assets to be returned when burning NFT

getCollateralSharePrice().notice: call the price feeder registry to retrieve the latest price of LP token

getSyntheticPrice().notice: call the price feeder registry to retrieve the latest price of NFT

globalCollatelizationRatio().notice: looks for the system collateral ratio basically calculates from total collateral deposited / total NFT minted

initialize(string,string,address,address.notice: the contructor that requires necessary params to setup ERC-1155 contract

mint(uint8,uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: taking 2 tokens and adding them to Quickswap LP, the returned LP will be locked and be the variant's collateral for the NFT issuing

redeem(uint8,uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: burning NFT and returning collateral assets, the offset fee will be charged when CR < 1

targetCollatelizationRatio(uint8).notice: calculates the target ratio that we need to either leaving and giving away (as discount) some collaterals to help bring the ratio back to 1

variantCollatelizationRatio(uint8).notice: looks for the collateral ratio for particular variant
